Play.PlayDescription: (14:53) 9-D.Brees pass short left to 12-M.Colston to NO 18 for 10 yards (20-A.Cason). San Diego challenged the pass completion ruling, and the play was REVERSED. 9-D.Brees pass incomplete short left to 12-M.Colston. The Saints were called for an illegal snap after the play. After the penalty, SD was permitted to CHALLENGE the ruling of a catch. As a result of the REVERSAL of the ruling on the field, the penalty was nullified. The result is a successful challenge by San Diego, an incomplete pass, and no penalty.
